topics.body:
So I was just walking outside, minding my own business. And suddenly I wave my arm trough a huge spiderweb. Tore half the thing to hell and pissed off the spider. So I apologized to the spider and came back.
I apolgized. To. A. Spider.
That says more about me than I ever could.

I know its irrational, I really do, but something about spiders just skeeves me the fuck out way more than it should. I know they eat harmful bugs like flies and mosquito. I know they are harmless if you just leave them alone, and yet my skin still crawls when I see them.
